dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Fluoride salt; Sodium fluoride; Potassium fluoride; Calcium fluoride; Ammonium fluoride; Synthetic fluoride; Industrial fluoride salt
Fluoride salt; Sodium fluoride; Potassium fluoride; Calcium fluoride; Ammonium fluoride; Synthetic fluoride; Industrial fluoride salt
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Fluoride salt refers to a family of salts that contain the fluoride ion and another element or radical. This product flow description includes the level of purity, any treatment processes the salt has undergone, whether it complies with any quality standards, how it is used, how it is produced including the precursor materials, and specifies its position within a production or consumption mix. Availability location details are outlined, such as whether the product is available to the consumer or is at the manufacturing plant stage, all details separated by commas.
氟化盐是指含有氟离子和另一个元素或基团的盐类家族。该产品流程描述包括纯度等级、盐通过的任何处理过程、是否符合任何质量标准、如何使用、如何生产（包括前体材料），并指出其在生产或消费混合中的位置。可获得性位置细节如阐述，例如产品是向消费者提供还是处于制造工厂阶段，所有细节用逗号分隔。
